conbody.p: HTTP Client originpaginationpaginationHTTP Client originYou can use pagination to retrieve a large volume of data from a paginated API. Use the pagination type supported by the API of the HTTP client.

When you use pagination, you must specify a result field path and can choose whether to include all other data in the record.To use pagination, you will likely need to consult the documentation for the origin system API to determine the pagination type to use and the properties to set.
The HTTP Client origin supports the following common pagination types:

dlentry.dd: After processing the current set of data, uses the link in the header to access the next set of data.
Begins processing with the specified initial page, and then requests the following page.
Begins processing with the specified initial offset, and then requests the following offset.
